subject: Re: [junit] Unable to check out files from CVS
msgSnippet: Narayanan, Here s the command-line I use to download JUnit. cvs -d :pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/junit co -r Version4 junit I have found the
messageBody:
Narayanan,

Here's the command-line I use to download JUnit.

cvs -d :pserver:anonymous@...:/cvsroot/junit co -r
Version4 junit

I have found the SourceForge CVS server _extremely_ sluggish and
unreliable. From the command line, I only can update about 50% of the
time, and less with Eclipse (I haven't looked into it, perhaps Eclipse
has a shorter default timeout?) Good luck,

David Saff


Narayanan Jayaratchagan wrote:

> Hi,
>
> When I try to check out files from the JUnit CVS repository using
> Eclipse, I get the following error:
>
> -----------ERROR-----------------------
> cvs co -d "junit" -P -r "BASE" "/junit"
> cvs checkout: warning: cannot write to history
> file /cvsroot/junit/CVSROOT/history: Permission denied
> cvs checkout: Updating junit
> cvs checkout: failed to create lock directory for
> `/cvsroot/junit/junit' (/cvsroot/junit/junit/#cvs.lock): Permission
> denied
> cvs checkout: failed to obtain dir lock in repository
> `/cvsroot/junit/junit'
> cvs [checkout aborted]: read lock failed - giving up
> -----------ERROR-----------------------
>
> It will be great if any of you could help me to get the latest code
> (for Version4).
>
> Thanks,
> Narayanan
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
